sentences.sContent: Sanchez’s confession was read out to the court.
sentences.sCn: 桑切斯的供词在法庭上宣读了出来。

sentences.sContent: At 3 a.m. Higgins broke down and made a full confession .
sentences.sCn: 凌晨三点，希金斯崩溃了，交代了一切。

sentences.sContent: I have a confession – I like Britney Spears’ music.
sentences.sCn: 我得承认，我喜欢布兰妮•斯皮尔斯的音乐。

remMethod.val: con(全部) + fess(说) + ion → 全部说出 → 供认， 招供

words.tran: 公开承认地；明白供认地；自称地
忏悔者；为信教而被迫害的教徒

trans.tranCn: 供认， 招供， 坦白； 供词； 承认
trans.tranOther: a statement that you have done something wrong, illegal, or embarras-sing, especially a formal statement
